description: This file defines the 'Assistant' React functional component for a Tic Tac Toe web application. The component provides a UI floating help/chat bubble that expands to show a chat interface with predefined responses, quick action buttons, and input handling to assist users with game instructions, rules, move suggestions, and mode explanations.

methods.name: getResponse(userMsg)
methods.description: Generates a contextual response based on user input message, offering help, rules, move suggestions, or mode explanations.

methods.name: sendMsg(msg)
methods.description: Handles sending a user message, appending it to chat state, and scheduling a response.

methods.name: quickAsk(question)
methods.description: Simplifies sending quick question prompts via predefined buttons and opening the assistant panel.

methods.name: Assistant({ board, isXNext, winner, gameOver, suggestMove, mode })

ctags.name: Assistant
ctags.pattern: /^function Assistant({ board, isXNext, winner, gameOver, suggestMove, mode }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ board, isXNext, winner, gameOver, suggestMove, mode })
